Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm having an issue with lag near surface. Normally, everything works good, but when I'm coming close (10-20km) to surface of Mun or Duna (Kerbin and Minmus seem not affected) heavy lag kicks in. What is interesting, when I'm on timewarp (not physics timewarp) the lag is gone. Any idea what it might be?

I'm using tons of mods, but as for now everything was fine

9 hours ago, Darkherring said:

Hi, I'm having an issue with lag near surface. Normally, everything works good, but when I'm coming close (10-20km) to surface of Mun or Duna (Kerbin and Minmus seem not affected) heavy lag kicks in. What is interesting, when I'm on timewarp (not physics timewarp) the lag is gone. Any idea what it might be?

I'm using tons of mods, but as for now everything was fine

Kopernicus seems to have an issue with the breaking ground surface features.
